short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to remove silly Stats on DAZN.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension removes the display of statistics data when watching a game on DAZN.
When watching the match or highlights afterwards, the statistics from the end of the match are displayed. This means you know immediately how the game ended and are sponsored.

This extension hides the display of these statistics so that you are not sponsored and the video is displayed larger.
